rule: Each category label should be followed by a colon and a single space before the list.
input: Text: Innovative practices were discussed at IBM with Tim Berners-Lee on Web Development.
validityText:

The input is comprehensible and allows for accurate entity extraction. Since the input meets all the criteria of the input specification—natural language text with possibly named entities and specific topics—it complies with the specification requirements.

No violation.
OK
